Test various builtin translations
=================================


    >>> from vanguardistas.pydebdep.translator import PackageNameTranslator
    >>> trans = PackageNameTranslator()

Paste
-----

    >>> print trans.egg_to_binary("Paste")
    python-paste
    >>> print trans.egg_to_binary("PasteDeploy")
    python-pastedeploy
    >>> print trans.egg_to_binary("PasteScript")
    python-pastescript
